structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents
Printing And Distribution Of Laws And Public Documents

law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 10. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] A town which has once been furnished with such books and documents shall not again be supplied with the same at the expense of the commonwealth. Towns may effect insurance thereon for their own benefit.
